label: 河東節
本: Edo Culture: Daily Life and Diversions in Urban Japan, 1600-1868 . University of Hawai'i Press . 1997
説明文: A form of joruri developed around the second decade of the eighteenth century by Masumi Katō. Popular especially in the following half century, this genre was often considered to be one of the most Edoesque jōruri sryles.［浄瑠璃,十寸見河東］
